comments.comment: okkatama kalin me rate inna  kondapananethi janadi pathiyawa elopan aiye  .ehema unanam api oyath ekka innawa mokada dn lankawe muslin un rata kanawa .ape ratata mehema issella unne.sinhala ape kaanthawanwa mislim un wada karanawa.ekath balem tharjanaya karala. pannipitiye bogahak kapanna yanawa paara patui kiyala aiyako buddasasane walalanna yanne.ehapaththe thiyena muslin palliya kadala parahadapiyauko .mokadda me lankawata wela thiyene.maithripala kiuwa pansal hadanawa ewa mewa karanawa kiyala monada bn mewenakan kale mehema jathibedayak thibbe ne mahinda rajapaksha  janadipathi inna kaale.mokadda me ape ratatawenne . deen aiye api oyath ekkai .üòëüòë

namuth mama danna de oba danagaththoth sasaren medenawa neyath washayenma
athanai obata waradune bahera lokaye obata hamuwena budu kenek na budu wenne sethak pamanamai
oba Samantha baddra dakenne baher lokayennam oba budun dakenneta yanneda bahera lokayenmai
budu wenne sethak mesa pudgalayek nowei a thamai buddha deeshanawa
me uthum bududaham oba dannawanam kawadawath mewata udagede denne na
oba budu pasebudu maha rahath uththamayek dakkoth a obe hadawathen mesa bahera lokayen nowa
a thama obata kesema dawasaka bahera lokayen hamuwena budu kenekwath Samantha baddra kenekwath na

replies.replyComment: to vagam hamuduruvant my bana, at ata kiyana unnahanse vitari, ubala  viryo vana hadana apa,
ma kattadyata ravatana apa, mu halparuvak , mu karana business akak, oyita vadiya hodi higa kapan
Puluwannam obath aka dawasak chewarayak daragena edala balanna
Amaru thamai bawuddhayo keyana unma thawa paththaken budu puthekuta arehe wenakota etama geheyek
Oba karana waden yam dawasaka arrya upawadayata lak unoth kalpa kalayak neraye thapenna wei apamanak nowa obata newan maga aherei me pewethuru buddha deshanawa
mage agama thamai uthum u nermala budu dahama aka thamai mama jeevetha pujawen rakenne
ubalata puduma amaruwak neh thiyenne sasane rakaganna.. ubalage aagama rakaganin ubala
sudusu daduwama weswaya neyama karai
buddha sasaneta atha thebba un nahenneth akenma thama
Salim Alsinaid thamage aagama adahagena paduwe wadak karagena jeewath wenna.. bauddayo thamange islam agamata wiruddawa wada karanne nane.. thamunla anthawadi wada karanna epa..
Budunge chewarayak daragena enna leseyen kenekuta ba a uthum chewarayata agawrawa nokara paduwe hetapalla
Dan oya chewarayak daragaththa uththamayekuta banene aka senhala bawuddhayekda

un wahansee dakeya hakke prabashwara una thama manasa thulen keyala unta therenne na
